entry.def: Methane is a colourless gas that has no smell. Natural gas consists mostly of methane.

means.word_mean: 1. a colorless odorless gas used as a fuel

Sentence.sentence: Many environmental experts now believe that methane is more responsible for global warming than carbon dioxide.
It is estimated that 25% of all methane that released into the atmosphere coming from farm animals
Half of the methane in the atmosphere is from animals.

sentences.en: The blast was caused by pockets of methane gas that ignited.
